Mikki Osei Berko (a mụrụ n'afọ 1973) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri

O mere Master Richard na usoro TV Taxi Driver na Dada Boat na Dada Boat Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nnọchi anya maka mpaghara ntuli aka Ayidiki maka otu oge, ọ bụkwa onye isi nchịkwa nke Mediagold Productions na Ghana.Mikki Osei Berko rụrụ ọrụ nke ọma na Radio Gold, ụlọ ọrụ redio nke onwe ya nke dị na Accra, nke ọ hapụrụ na July afọ 2003 iji sonye na Happy FM. O mechara gosipụta na Kessben FM. Ọ bụ ụbụrụ no n'azụ ọganihu Kente Radio, ụlọ ọrụ redio n'ịntanetị nke Pan-Africa.
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri
